snippet: In his return to the ice, Sidney Crosby was far from the best Penguin on the ice, however, and that is exactly what makes Pittsburgh so frightening.
lead_paragraph: In his return to the ice, Sidney Crosby was far from the best Penguin on the ice, however, and that is exactly what makes Pittsburgh so frightening.

headline.seo: Crosby Blends In as Penguins Stand Tall Against Rangers
headline.main: Crosby Blends In as Penguins Stand Tall Against Rangers
headline.print_headline: Crosby Blends In as Penguins Stand Tall Against Rangers
